name: A Weasel on the Moon
description:
Help a weasel astronaut finding his way home!

I made this game for the Weekly Game Jam 87: Infinite Hallway.

My Interpretation of the infinite hallway is the surface of the moon where you navigate the weasel. The game itself is just a little adventure, telling the story of one lost weasel with just a few interactions. I hope you have fun!

Controls: WASD/Arrow keys and SPACE

Credits:
Game, Art, Sound
    made by me

Music
